EmailTemplate.name: Credit Terms Request Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Thank you for your request for credit terms. I am pleased to inform you that <<company name>> has been approved and set up with Net 30 terms with a $X,XXX credit limit. Your invoices will be sent via email (if you prefer regular mail, please let us know).
Please note that outstanding orders will maintain the terms in place at the time the order was placed. All future orders will process with new terms.
We appreciate your business and continued partnership with YETI.
Thank you!
{!User.CommunityNickname} Financial Services Specialist YETI {!User.Phone} financialservices@yeti.com yeti.com
